definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Fahrenheit will be going to Macau on the 26th and Singapore on the 27th.
sentences.chinese: 飛輪海將於26號抵達澳門，27號到新加坡去。

sentences.english: He is the youngest in Fahrenheit, but he is very tough.
sentences.chinese: 他是飛輪海里面最年輕的，但是他很堅強。

sentences.english: Fahrenheit flew to Singapore for an Autograph Session…
sentences.chinese: 飛輪海來新加坡舉辦簽唱會。

sentences.english: I like Fahrenheit combination, they are my idol.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡飛輪海組合，他們是我的偶像。

sentences.english: It's been a while we Fahrenheit haven't gone there to have event with you guys.
sentences.chinese: 飛輪海已經有段時間沒有去那裏跟你們一起搞活動了。

sentences.english: I have been busy for our Fahrenheit's 2nd album promotions recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近我一直忙於宣傳我們飛輪海的第二張專輯。

definition: Angela Chang (1982-), Taiwanese pop singer and actress
to view one's past as miserable and one's present as happy (idiom)
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
